channel.title: [RESOLVED] Can't purchase gp in game
channel.description:
**What happened:**
I tried to buy 8,000 gp. When I click the 8,000 denomination and press Purchase, it comes up with some red text to the right of the Purchase button that says 'Unknown Error'.
**What was SUPPOSED to happen:**
It should have processed the transaction so that I could buy a sweet pumpkin head with gp.
**Steps to reproduce this issue:**
1. Click Customize Item Shop 2. Click Buy Now (gp) on an item for which you haven't enough gp. A window will pop up with 4 denominations of gp to purchase. 3. Select a gp denomination and click Purchase.

item.title: [RESOLVED] Can't purchase gp in game

item.title: [RESOLVED] Can't purchase gp in game
item.dc:creator: David_Fuchs
item.description:
What happened:

I tried to buy 8,000 gp. When I click the 8,000 denomination and press Purchase, it comes up with some red text to the right of the Purchase button that says ‘Unknown Error’.

What was SUPPOSED to happen:

It should have processed the transaction so that I could buy a sweet pumpkin head with gp.

Steps to reproduce this issue:

  1. Click Customize Item Shop
  2. Click Buy Now (gp) on an item for which you haven’t enough gp. A window will pop up with 4 denominations of gp to purchase.
  3. Select a gp denomination and click Purchase.
